name: kdyby/translation
description: Integration of Symfony/Translation into Nette Framework

suggest.symfony/locale: Locale component provides fallback code to handle cases when the intl extension is missing.
suggest.kdyby/console: If you wanna use extract command and much others, install also console.
suggest.symfony/yaml: If you wanna store translations in YAML format - supports multiline strings.
suggest.texy/texy: If you wanna use html tags in translated string
